subject: COMMANDE DU 09/12 Pas reçue
description_text: Bonsoir, Ma commande n'est jamais parvenue à destination comme cela est écrit sur votre plate-forme de suivi. Ce sont des mensonges et je demande à être remboursé immédiatement !

conversations.body_text: Hi SABRINA GHANEME,  Could you please provide your order number? I can check the issue for you, as it seems unusual that it hasn’t arrived after such a long time.

Hi SABRINA GHANEME,    We sincerely apologize for the delay in shipping your order. Due to a logistics issue, we will either expedite your shipment via UPS or issue a refund. We deeply regret any inconvenience this may have caused.

Hi SABRINA GHANEME,    I've noticed the package hasn't been delivered yet. It's highly likely it's been lost. We'll arrange for a replacement shipment as soon as possible. Here's your tracking information.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047222108358

I apologize for the interruption; please disregard my previous email.  I noticed your order has been delivered. May I ask if you have received it?  https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ455510409625124/trackdetails
